DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Heterologous Prime/Boost Vaccine Regimen Ad26.Mos4.HIV Aluminum Phosphate-Adjuvanted Clade C gp140 Preventing Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) -1 Infection Women Sub-Saharan Africa
